 family has been doing over year now we started on amazon then switched over actual company site we have really enjoyed doing have liked all recipes has been great experience our kids we love trying all new dishes exploring other cultures through cuisine paired some meals up with our country study in home school we do think is bit expensive what you get noticed reviewer saying that you get one packet spices which is not accurate you usually get three or four packets sometimes bottles spices seasonings sauces etc you also get small kitchen tool along with recipes shopping lists if you sign up through their site they sometimes offer deals we have done year subscription with black friday discount two years in row now currently on our second year we have been disappointed this year as we have been receiving duplicate boxes past meals because this we have decided not do year subscription next year looked at their site as now they only add new boxes every year price we did want kits that we have already done these kits are in no way cheap meal they provide recipes harder find seasonings you provide pantry staple seasonings all food they are exploring other cultures other parts might add we only did few months through amazon then full year now into our second year we have already received duplicate boxes past kits each kit has recipes several meals but we make them all at once invite other family join us everyone has loved meals sad not do in future but there just are enough meal kits sustain keeping subscription their customer service has been good when we received broken spice packets etc recommend this anyone who wants make try new foods not cheap though so would keep that in mind every kit offers vegetarian alternatives with recipes which is nice
